1.text: Mix 3/4 cup of the water with 1 cup glue in a bowl.

2.text: Mix 2 tablespoons of Borax with a 1/2 cup of water in a separate bowl.

4.text: Put the mixture in a plastic bag with a good seal.

6.text: Pour 1 cup of white glue into a bowl.

7.text: Pour 1 cup of liquid starch into the glue mixture.

8.text: Mix more starch in if it seems too sticky.

9.text: Store Gak in a container with a good lid.

11.text: Add one tablespoon of cornstarch to the saucepan.

12.text: Remove the saucepan from the heat when the mixture starts to thicken.

13.text: Allow the mixture to cool before you play (or eat) it.

14.text: Store edible flubber in a container or seal-able plastic bag.
